bio: Experienced software developer and daily Twitch streamer, engaging with viewers over coding and gaming.
I am a full stack developer with a love for tech. Watch as I build and discuss projects live on stream!
Diving deep into cloud computing and large scale systems, sharing practical insights and complex solutions.
Exploring the nuances of software architecture and design, I provide expert analysis and tips on system structuring.
Join me as we tackle coding basics and computer science fundamentals. Perfect for beginners looking to learn!
I'm a developer passionate about open-source projects, sharing how to contribute to and build meaningful software.
